alert.note: Alert for Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; La Salle; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 23 at 2:40PM CST until January 24 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Elevated to critical fire weather conditions possible Tuesday... .Strong northwesterly flow associated with a cold front is expected Tuesday. Relative humidity values are expected to drop into the teens across portions of South Texas behind the front. The combination of low relative humidity values and strong winds will lead to elevated to critical fire weather conditions Tuesday. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR THE SOUTHERN COASTAL PLAINS AND BRUSH COUNTRY... * AFFECTED AREA...La Salle, McMullen, Inland Kleberg, Inland Nueces and Inland San Patricio. * TIMING...From Noon Tuesday through 8 PM Tuesday night. * WINDS...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 60s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Inland Kleberg; Inland Nueces; Inland San Patricio; La Salle; McMullen
